mapper.insert: insert into recipe (recipte_no, write_no, title, thumbnail, introduce, recipe_cate_no, serving, time_taken, step, tip, enroll_date, state,seq, things_name, ea, things_url,RECIPTE_ORDER, explanation, recipe_seq_img,write_name) VALUES (SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{write_no}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{introduce}, #{recipe_cate_no}, #{serving}, #{time_taken}, #{step}, #{tip}, SYSDATE, #{state},1, #{things_name}, #{ea}, #{things_url},1, #{explanation}, #{recipe_seq_img},#{write_name})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipe WHERE LOWER(title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY recipte_no) AS rn FROM recipe r WHERE LOWER(title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'
AND LOWER(recipe_cate_no) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{category}) || '%'
AND r.state != 3 )
WHERE rn BETWEEN #{from} + 1 AND #{from} + #{rows}
